properties.description:
The KPC(Kurabo Perfect Cotton) technology is only done by the Japanese Company Kurabo. Kurabo holds its factory in Gunnma, Japan. 
The ink they use for this particular model is 9% oz Japanese super dark indigo
(the color of this indigo is too dark, so it is used by mixing with water which is from japan). 
http://www.kurabo.co.jp/english/profile/j_list.html#kk2
properties.title: Cotton Texturing

properties.description:
The Diesel designer team which has been keeping its shape since 1978, place its headquarter at Breganze, Italy.
http://copperconcept.org/references/diesel-headquarters-italy
properties.title: Designer Team(Headquarter)
Supima Cotton
properties.description: The high quality cotton that diesel uses are grown in the Northern coastal valleys of Piura, a city in Peru. The Jeans uses 100% cotton. http://www.diesel.com/ourglory/

properties.title: Copper
properties.description: Produces high quality copper and copper which will be processed into a button.

properties.title: Aluminium
properties.description: Produces high quality aluminium and copper which will be processed into a button.

properties.title: Making Buttons
properties.address: 48 Temple Bar, Dublin, Co. Dublin, Ireland
properties.description:
The factory mixes the metals, and make a plain button which will be textured soon after. 
http://ww2.buttonfactory.ie/content.php?ID=3

properties.title: Sewing
properties.description:
Sewing the jeans together with the button, and the leather. Some other models are sewed in morocco, or thailand.
http://www.chinalaborwatch.org/news/new-347.html

properties.title: Leather Manufacturing
properties.description: The factory where manufactures the leather for viker jeans is also in Italy.

properties.title: Texturing buttons
properties.description: The buttons made are textured at a factory which is near the factory where the buttons are made. Both factories are owned by the same company.

properties.title: Diesel shop
properties.description:
The shop is in Minatomirai station. It is a small shop, but sells numerous products. 
http://www.diesel.com/store-locator/store/213/yokohama-queen-s-east-3f-232-minatomirai-nishiku

properties.title: Storehouse
properties.description: The store house is also one of the biggest diesel shop in japan. It send out products to diesels around the Kanto area.
Diesel is a brand which is widely known as producing high quality fashion items. One of their main product is their high quality jeans.
properties.title: Diesel Viker Jeans
